Test: util_cat_sys

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

2020-07-08

Source: vignettes/tests/test_util_cat_sys.Rmd
test_util_cat_sys.Rmd
library(testthat)
library(jeksterslabRutils)
context("Test util_cat_sys.")

Parameters

year <- format(Sys.time(), "%Y")
knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Variable = "`year`",
    Description = "Current year.",
    Value = year
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
Variable Description Value
year Current year. 2020

Run test

results <- capture.output(
  util_cat_sys(
    command = "date +%Y"
  )
)

Results

knitr::kable(
  x = data.frame(
    Description = "Current year.",
    Parameter = year,
    Result = results
  ),
  row.names = FALSE
)
Description Parameter Result
Current year. 2020 2020 
test_that("util_cat_sys works", {
  expect_equivalent(
    results,
    year
  )
})

Contents
